name: waris
description: Islamic inheritance calculator (faraidh) and Indonesian number-to-words converter (terbilang) with BigInt precision

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run vite build
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run vite build --minify
scripts.validate: bun x tsc --noEmit && bun run test:complete && bunx biome lint
scripts.check: bunx biome check --fix && bun run test:complete
scripts.full-check: bun run validate && echo '✅ All validations passed!'
scripts.pre-release: bun run test:complete && bun run build && bun run test:dist:simple && echo '🚀 Ready for release!'
scripts.test-all: echo '🧪 Running comprehensive tests...' && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ All 118 tests passed!'
scripts.verify: echo '🔍 Verifying project...' && bun x tsc --noEmit && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ TypeScript OK + All tests passed!'
scripts.quality: echo '📊 Running quality checks...' && bunx biome format --write && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ Code formatted + All tests passed!'
scripts.pre-commit: echo '🚀 Pre-commit validation...' && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ Source tests passed!' && bun run build && echo '✅ Build completed!' && bun run test:dist:all && echo '🎉 All pre-commit checks passed!'
scripts.commit-ready: echo '📋 Checking commit readiness...' && bun run pre-commit
scripts.size: bun run build && bun run --shell "du -sh dist/*"
scripts.analyze: bun run build && bunx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
